TopicTitle: I can steel download the demo, if i already bought the game, with the same account email ?

Articles.Content: I bought the game a long time ago. I can still download the demo if i bought the game first ? Doesen't matter if i use the same email i have in my account for the full version or use other email for downloading the demo ?
I think you'll still be able to get it from Squad. You can't from Steam - it hides the demos for games you own.
Yes, I don't think you even need an account for downloading the demo. Just go to the KSP website, Demo, and enter your e-mail address, that should do it.

Yes, I don't think you even need an account for downloading the demo. Just go to the KSP website, Demo, and enter your e-mail address, that should do it.

Yes, i saw that you can without login. Thank you. It worked.
